cause.description:
This group is for every teen who has/is/knows somone who cuts their wrists. We are here to help! Please pass this on, to tell them that we actually care!
1. Teens musnt be suicidal
2. No one should purposly hurt themselves
3. We are all in this together!
cause.mission: Help teens to stop them cutting themselves up!
cause.name: Fight against teens slitting their wrists!
